ar.com.hjg.pngj
Enum PngFilterType

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<PngFilterType>
      ar.com.hjg.pngj.PngFilterType
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<PngFilterType>
public enum PngFilterType
extends java.lang.Enum<PngFilterType>

Internal PNG predictor filter, or strategy to select it.

Enum Constant Summary
FILTER_AGRESSIVE
          Aggresive strategy: select one of the above filters trying each of the filters (this is done every 8 rows)
FILTER_ALTERNATE
          Uses all fiters, one for lines, cyciclally.
FILTER_AVERAGE
          AVERAGE filter
FILTER_DEFAULT
          Default strategy: select one of the above filters depending on global image parameters
FILTER_NONE
          No filter.
FILTER_PAETH
          PAETH predictor
FILTER_SUB
          SUB filter (uses same row)
FILTER_UP
          UP filter (uses previous row)

FILTER_AGRESSIVE

public static final PngFilterType FILTER_AGRESSIVE
Aggresive strategy: select one of the above filters trying each of the filters (this is done every 8 rows)

FILTER_ALTERNATE

public static final PngFilterType FILTER_ALTERNATE
Uses all fiters, one for lines, cyciclally. Only for tests.
